Clip.Title: NAZI TEMPLE OF DOOM
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover the astonishing secrets behind a recently found artifact. Our investigation uncovers a story of intrigue, shady deals, and a plot by Nazi leader Heinrich Himmler to create a sinister Camelot inside "The Nazi Temple of Doom," Germany's Wewelsburg Castle.

Clip.Title: MISSION TO MURDER HITLER
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The operation Valkyrie to kill Hitler was led by German resistance willing to turn traitor to save lives. See how the plot was nearly carried out, through gripping re-enactments, and firsthand interviews from members of the resistance.

Clip.Title: THE SILK ROAD
Clip.Episode: Steep Road to the Oasis: Kyrgyzstan & Uzbekistan
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Visit the new cities that have emerged near the border between Kyrgyzstan and China, and the people who live side-by-side in harmony amidst the uncertainties after the collapse of the former Soviet Union.

Clip.Title: NAZI TEMPLE OF DOOM
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover the astonishing secrets behind a recently found artifact. Our investigation uncovers a story of intrigue, shady deals, and a plot by Nazi leader Heinrich Himmler to create a sinister Camelot inside "The Nazi Temple of Doom," Germany's Wewelsburg Castle.

Clip.Title: MISSION TO MURDER HITLER
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The operation Valkyrie to kill Hitler was led by German resistance willing to turn traitor to save lives. See how the plot was nearly carried out, through gripping re-enactments, and firsthand interviews from members of the resistance.

Clip.Title: SKY VIEW
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Soar over Europe and experience the landscape from an eagle's perspective. This remarkable series uses the latest HD and camera mount technology to give the audience a view of Europe and its history that will takes their breath away.

Clip.Title: THE HISTORY OF THE FUTURE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Technology is advancing at a geometric rate. Find out how far we have come and how far our minds are going to innovate.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the port city of Halifax, to the historic Acadian shores and international waters beyond, this aerial exploration documents the treasures and mysteries of Nova Scotia's Southern coast.

Clip.Title: CANADA 1812: FORGED IN FIRE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Isaac Brocks's daring made him a hero during the early months of the War of 1812, but it may also have been his fatal flaw.

Clip.Title: THE HISTORY OF THE FUTURE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Technology is advancing at a geometric rate. Find out how far we have come and how far our minds are going to innovate.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: GREEN PARADISE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Discover destinations around the world, where local economies protect natural resources and wildlife diversity.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Water in the World's 8th Largest Economy
Clip.EpisodeSummary: As world population increases, the struggle over one of the earth's most valuable resources continues to intensify. Take a look at water in California, the world's 8th largest economy. Is the world in danger of running out of water?

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Journey into the Ice Age and Solar Eclipse Chasers
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Journey back into the days of the Ice Age and see what life was like. And, meet eclipse chasers - adventurers who travel the world to witness and document solar eclipses.

Clip.Title: THE INCREDIBLE BIONIC MAN
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The quest to build and animate an artificial being entirely from bionic parts shows the incredible strides we've made in body replacement technologies.

Clip.Title: WARSHIPS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Ride along with a Canadian fleet of Warships as they patrol the Persian Gulf.

Clip.Title: ISLAM AND THE WEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In this 3-part series, investigate the proliferation of Islam into Europe and beyond.

Clip.Title: ALL ABOARD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Travel across the entire island of Sicily by train and uncover some cultural history along the way.

Clip.Title: RIVERS OF THE WORLD
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Travel up the 4,200km of one of the last remaining nourishing rivers in the world.
